text.title: US economy adds 215,000 jobs in July; unemployment rate remains steady at 5.3%
text.head: US economy adds 215,000 jobs in July; unemployment rate remains steady at 5.3%
Sources

list.item: "Employment Situation Summary" — Bureau of Labor Statistics , August 7, 2015
Nelson D. Schwartz. "Job Growth Steady in July, Possibly Easing Path for Fed Action" — The New York Times , August 7, 2015
Myles Udland. "US adds 215,000 jobs in July, unemployment rate unchanged at 5.3%" — Business Insider , August 7, 2015
Lucia Mutikani. "Solid U.S. jobs report bolsters case for Fed rate hike" — Reuters , August 7, 2015
Patrick Gillespie. "Solid and steady: U.S. economy gains 215,000 jobs in July" — CNN Money , August 7, 2015
